1.title: Frenemies
1.plot: Unsure of whether or not that 'friend' is really a friend? Auntie Jodi helps you to quickly decide if you want those needy souls in your world.

2.title: Trust Your Gut
2.plot: Many people have trust issues. Auntie wants to know - Are you bold enough to trust your gut?

3.title: Work Weeping
3.plot: Do you hate your job? Auntie has some real-life advice to help you find the career or your dreams.

4.title: Fake News
4.plot: Be it Fake News or Fake People, Auntie thinks fake is bad.

5.title: Winners & Losers
5.plot: What do video games, slot machines, pro-sporting events, and elections all have in common? Well, usually there's a winner and a loser--that's usually...Auntie explains.

6.title: Signs
6.plot: What's your sign... You can judge Auntie by the shoes she wears, the champagne she drinks, and the way she drives...just don't base your judgment on her astrological sign...or do...it's your call.

7.title: Dating
7.plot: How's your dating life? Even if you're married or in a relationship--it should always involve flirting--but no craziness or ghosting allowed...Auntie explains..

8.title: Honesty
8.plot: Is honesty the best policy? Of course that usually depends on the situation...and the people involved...Auntie dares to tell you the truth about all this.

9.title: Parenting
9.plot: Auntie loves children...but when children become uncontrolled brats...not so much. Whatever to do? Auntie has a hint for that.

10.title: You're Unique!
10.plot: Be bold. Be brave. And be true to your sparkly self--It can be scary being "out there"--Auntie knows this...and has a helpful hint for dealing with the jealous in our midst.

imdb.plot outline: Auntie Jodi is now offering her advice in her very own web series. Why? Do you have a frienemy who is causing problems in your life? Need to know what to do? Auntie Jodi has a Helpful Hint to cover that topic...along with hints, tips, and advice on how to "Stay Sane in an Insane World." This premiere series is based on Auntie's (aka Jodi Adler) Amazon best-seller, "How Dare You?" Auntie Jodi is the advice-giver and life coach for those who do not believe in seeking the advice of a life coach. She's everyone's favorite Aunt--the one you want to sit next to at dinner parties, because everything is better with a side of snarky (and warm) fun. Plus, the advice and Helpful Hints come with Auntie's Happy Hour flair--cocktail anyone? Auntie's "over the top" advice is just what the world needs these days...or so say her followers...ask Auntie a question...she always has an answer. And remember--You can certainly doubt authority, just don't doubt Auntie Jodi.
